Package jam.fit

Contains classes for parametric fitting of 1-dimensional histograms.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
CalibFit Makes a linear fit to a number of points
Fit This defines the necessary methods that need to be defined in order for a fit routine to work with FitControl.
GaussianFit This abstract class uses NonLinearFit to fit a single gaussian peak with a background..
LevenbergMarquadt This uses the Levenberg-Marquadt prescription for finding the local minimum of chi-squared given seed parameter values for the function to fit.
LoadFit Load a fit routine..
Matrix Matrix is a generic set of linear algebra algorithms.It can accept a string argument and return a rectangular matrix array of double precision numbers, along with the row and column sizes.
MultipleGaussians This abstract class uses NonLinearFit to fit a single gaussian peak with a background..
NonLinearFit This abstract class uses LevenbergMarquadt to do non-linear parametric function fitting.
Parameter Parameters used to fit.
PeakIntensity Takes 4 channels as input...limits of background, and limits of peak.
 

Exception Summary
FitException Exception that is throw if there is a fit exception that can be handled inside fit
 

Package jam.fit Description

Contains classes for parametric fitting of 1-dimensional histograms.
